title: Daunting Turns
description: Turner Colson is one of the bigger Colson brothers. He lives off the land bouncing from chapter to chapter as he's needed. He's a mute by choice, and demands privacy when possible, which is why he prefers the solitude of the Colorado mountains if he's not working.Georgia Pine is a very young and prominent lawyer who's career just took a nasty turn because of a lying client. One bad day sent her to the clubhouse for a good drunk to drown her anger and disappointment. Little does she know the biggest meanest man to walk the earth is slowly falling in love with her as he watches her across the bar...
author: Reese Madison
